name: hi there (Xabi Goenaga)
description:
Theres a small bug that makes impossible to play in chrome/edge browsers. We are workin on that. On Firefox works fine tho

Hi there is a chill game about feeding some pigeons.

Hope you like it!

───

  • Rocks: The Tales Factory
  • Water shader: Alexander Ameye
  • Skybox: Richard Whitelock

  • Watercolour shader: Cyanilux
